columns.Description: Name of the web browser with the extension
columns.Name: BrowserName

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the browser extension
columns.Name: ExtensionId

columns.Description: Description from the publisher about the extension
columns.Name: ExtensionDescription

columns.Description: Risk level for the extension based on the permissions it has requested
columns.Name: ExtensionRisk

columns.Description: Name given to each permission based on what the extension is asking for
columns.Name: PermissionName

columns.Description: Explanation of what the permission is supposed to do
columns.Name: PermissionDescription

columns.Description: Risk level for the permission based on the type of access it would allow
columns.Name: PermissionRisk

columns.Description: Whether the permission is required for the extension to run, or optional
columns.Name: IsPermissionRequired
